name: 2048 Animation Graphics Puzzle
description:
2048 Animation Puzzle Edition

2048 Animation Puzzle Edition is a HTML5 Skill Game.
Enjoy this Best 2048 version! Use arrow keys to move the tiles. When two identical tiles touch, they’ll merge into one.
Will you get to the 2048 tile?

GAME FEATURES:

  • Animation graphics
  • Ready to Publish
  • HTML5, Mobile
  • .capx files included
  • Touch and arrow keys
  • Playable in all platforms (Mobile, PC, etc.)
  • Easy to Reskin
  • Share Button
  • High quality Graphics
  • All Assets
  • Construct2 Source (Capx)

what you Get

  • Construct2 Source (Capx)
  • Html5 Exported

Easy Installation

The ZIP package contains the game with 720×1280 resolution that scales to fit a full device oriented screen.

Customization

The game is completely customizable from Skins to Branding.
All source code is included so you can easily make changes or hire us to customize the game for you.

Compatibility :

Fully compatible with most servers, however always good to check with your admin team or host company.

Naturally achieving 100% compatibility across every device screen size is very difficult, but all games created are tested on the most common of all web browsers and devices including Chrome, Firefox, Safari and Opera, tablets, laptops, iPhone and Android devices.
